fields.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Name of the External Payroll Earning.
Code of the External Payroll Earning, which is also used as the unique identifier for the External Payroll Earning for the reference ID type Earning_Code.
A non unique external payroll code. You can only specify this field if the Enable External Payroll Code check box is selected on the Edit Tenant Setup - HCM task.
If true, the External Payroll Earning is position-based.
ID of the Calculation Category. The value is always Outbound Payroll Interface.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group(s) for which the External Payroll Earning is relevant. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".
ID of the Allowed Payroll Input Type(s). Specify either the WID or "Payroll_Input_Type_Id=12345". Allowed Payroll Input Types include Adjustment, Goal Amount, Input, and Ongoing.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Specify the Compensation Elements when the External Payroll Earning relates to compensation. Specify either the WID or "Compensation_Element_ID=12345".
Specify the Time Off instance when the External Payroll Earning is for paid time off. Specify either the WID or "Absence_Component_Related_Calculation_ID=12345".

Specify Benefit Plans when the External Payroll Earning applies to a benefit plan. Specify either the WID or the relevant Reference ID. Examples: Health_Care_Coverage_Plan_ID, Health_Savings_Account_Plan_ID, Insurance_Coverage_Plan_ID.
Specify when the External Payroll Earning applies to specific benefit groups. Contains Benefit Group Coverages data.
The order of the criteria used for scheduling.
Contains the scheduling criteria calculation data.
Contains Time Calculation Tag(s) data.
If true, the web service excludes the External Payroll Earning from outbound Payroll Interface integrations.
Comments regarding the External Payroll Earning.
ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".. Supports multiple values.
ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".. Supports multiple values.

Absence_Calculation_Reference.description: Specify the Time Off instance when the External Payroll Earning is for paid time off. Specify either the WID or "Absence_Component_Related_Calculation_ID=12345".

Benefit_Plan_Reference.description: Specify Benefit Plans when the External Payroll Earning applies to a benefit plan. Specify either the WID or the relevant Reference ID. Examples: Health_Care_Coverage_Plan_ID, Health_Savings_Account_Plan_ID, Insurance_Coverage_Plan_ID.

Calculation_Category_Reference.description: ID of the Calculation Category. The value is always Outbound Payroll Interface.

Code.description: Code of the External Payroll Earning, which is also used as the unique identifier for the External Payroll Earning for the reference ID type Earning_Code.

Comments.description: Comments regarding the External Payroll Earning.

Compensation_Element_Reference.description: Specify the Compensation Elements when the External Payroll Earning relates to compensation. Specify either the WID or "Compensation_Element_ID=12345".

External_Payroll_Code.description: A non unique external payroll code. You can only specify this field if the Enable External Payroll Code check box is selected on the Edit Tenant Setup - HCM task.

External_Payroll_Earning_Reference_Earni.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Payroll_Earning_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Frequency_Reference_Frequency_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Frequency_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Group_Reference_Pay_Component_Group_Code.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Group_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Inbound_Only.description: If true, the web service excludes the External Payroll Earning from outbound Payroll Interface integrations.

Name.description: Name of the External Payroll Earning.

Order.description: The order of the criteria used for scheduling.

Outbound_Pay_Component_Group_Reference_P.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Outbound_Pay_Component_Group_Reference_W.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Pay_Group_Reference.description: ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group(s) for which the External Payroll Earning is relevant. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".

Pay_Groups_for_Payroll_Interface_Referen.description: ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".. Supports multiple values.
ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".. Supports multiple values.

Payroll_Input_Type_Reference.description: ID of the Allowed Payroll Input Type(s). Specify either the WID or "Payroll_Input_Type_Id=12345". Allowed Payroll Input Types include Adjustment, Goal Amount, Input, and Ongoing.

Position_Based.description: If true, the External Payroll Earning is position-based.

Scheduling_Calculation.description: Contains the scheduling criteria calculation data.

Waived_Coverage_Reference.description: Specify when the External Payroll Earning applies to specific benefit groups. Contains Benefit Group Coverages data.
